snippet: Television and movie portrayals of veterans vary widely, to the frustration of many vets. Here, they say, are some of the best and worst recent examples.
abstract: Advocate Chris Marvin and colleagues rate portrayal of veterans in four recent films and television shows.
lead_paragraph: Television and movie portrayals of veterans vary widely, to the frustration of many vets. Here, they say, are some of the best and worst recent examples.

headline.main: Veterans Pan, and Cheer, Their Counterparts on the Screen
headline.print_headline: Veterans Give Thumbs Up, or Down, to On-Screen Portrayals
